data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Müller, Andreas, Mauss, Volker (2016): Palaearctic Hoplitis bees of the subgenera Formicapis and Tkalcua (Megachilidae, Osmiini): biology, taxonomy and key to species. Zootaxa 4127 (1): 105-120, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4127.1.5|2 occurrences
